items.sentence: Tom and Mary aren't really married to each other, are they?
It looks like you managed to solve the problem on your own.
I promised Taninna I would take her to Kabylie this summer.
You should tell Tom that Mary isn't planning on doing that.
Tom didn't seem to be aware that Mary hadn't yet done that.
Doing this the way Tom suggested would save the most money.
I'm not even going to ask why there's sauce on the ceiling.
Tom helped the old lady onto the bus with her shopping bag.
Tom said he felt weird just before collapsing on the floor.
Tom had bags under his eyes after several sleepless nights.
Any trouble Tom has ever gotten into was caused by alcohol.
Tom did his utmost to stop his marriage from falling apart.
Tom put on so much weight that he had to get a bigger belt.
Tom's car was rear-ended and he suffered a whiplash injury.
Tom was attracted to Mary from the moment he first saw her.
Tom has a lot of faults, but I still think he's a good guy.
How long does it take to get to Boston from Chicago by car?
How long does it take to get to Boston from Chicago by bus?
When Mary turned around, she saw Tom pointing a gun at her.
I thought that you said you wanted to go swimming with Tom.
